name: O Chamado da FERA (Luma W. Oliveira)
name_original: O Chamado da FERA (Luma W. Oliveira)
description:
Installation: Download the file and extract following the installer.

A mother takes a journey through a mysterious labyrinth, full of secrets and puzzles, looking for her son, who disappeared after entering the place moments before her.

CONTROLS:

[ A ] [ D ] or [directional arrows] move the character

[ mouse ] dialog ending and interactive item visibility.

[ spacebar ] initiate interaction

[ I ] opens the inventory

[ Lshift ] opens the diary

[ ESC ] opens the settings

O Chamado da FERA is a project that started in college as the final work of the adventure games at ECDD/INFNET.
